Engines ripped out in seconds ‚Äî the Rozzi R580GRA12 in action! With a custom bracket on the material handler, the car stays firmly in place while the jaws do their job. Power and precision working together ‚Äî the perfect team!

Raw power, refined by tradition.
The new T510 is ready to take on the toughest demolition and recycling tasks.

Outfitted with a 10-meter boom, 4 outriggers, and a 4.5L Stage V engine delivering 129 kW, this machine combines muscle and intelligence.
It comes with fully automatic lubrication, an OPUS-B4 7‚Äù display, and a camera setup for total control on site.

In these photos, it‚Äôs shown with a VTN CI1200 shear. The final configuration will also include a Rozzi R580GRA12 demolition grapple ‚Äî perfect for power and precision in every phase of work.

Built for performance. Trusted for durability.
